oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Provost Marshal pass for John H. Jennings, Co. C, 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This pass was generated by the Provost Marshal's Office in Bolivar, Tenn. and allowed John H. Jennings to pass through the lines. The pass has a description of Jennings on the back: John H. Jennings, 21 yrs old, blonde hair, blue eyes, fair complexion,5 feet, 8 inches tall, native of Tenn., residence Decatur, Tenn. and occupation is a farmer. Jennings was a Union man and later joined Co. C, 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA.
